segments.text: Can you help me find a nice gift for my young niece ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Barbie dolls are quite popular , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . Girls love Barbie . Show me a Barbie doll .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take a look at the newest Barbie â€” Digital Barbie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's beautiful . What's the price for Digital Barbie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our regular price for Digital Barbie is $ 29.95 plus tax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only $ 29.95 ? I'll buy it , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Another one sold . Do you see anything else you would like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but no . This will do it for now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tax brings your total to $ 32.42 . How would you like to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2
